name: Five nights at Scary Factory game
name_original: Five nights at Scary Factory game
description:
From your small office you must watch the security cameras carefully. You have a very limited amount of electricity that you're allowed to use per night. That means when you run out of power for the night- no more security doors and no more lights! You must find scary things on the monitors and protect yourself if needed!

Can you survive five nights at the Scary Factory?
